translations: 新月形的东西；弧影，甲弧影；甲半月

sentences.sentence: The lunula is the half-moon shaped pale area at the bottom of finger nails.
sentences.translation: 手指甲底部的半月形苍白区域称为甲半月(lunula)。

sentences.sentence: The lowest no observable effect concentrations (LNOEC) of Cu, Zn and Mn on the growth of Closterium lunula were found to be 31.
sentences.translation: 运用评价化学品毒性藻类测试的标准实验方法 ，得到铜、锌和锰对月形藻生长的最小无显著差异浓度 （LNOEC）分别为31。
